name: AirPatrol Corporation
overview: AirPatrol Corporation offers wireless threat management solutions. It offers Wireless Locator System, a security solution for businesses to protect sensitive data and proprietary systems against wireless-enabled network and endpoint attacks; WLS Cell/WLAN Sensor, an ethernet-capable sensor to detect and locate cellular technologies and 802.11 a/b/g/n wireless devices; WLS WLAN Sensor with two Ethernet ports that offer network pass-through capability; and WLS Cell Sensor to detect and locate cellular phone devices on commonly used bands. The company also provides Wireless Policy Manager for laptops to manage security of wireless-enabled endpoints; and Wireless EndPoint Client for enforcing corporate wireless security policies to protect wireless endpoints. AirPatrol Corporation offers its solutions for wireless threat management and cell phone detection applications in corporate enterprise, government and military, financial services, and retail sectors. The company is based in Palo Alto, California with additional offices in the United States, Canada, and Europe.
